TopicTitle: SELV - Stockalike Expendable Launch Vehicles V.1.4 - Updated 25/09/2015

Articles.Content:
Some updates on the new rocket:

![OsoqWcD.png](http://i.imgur.com/OsoqWcD.png)

This is a 2.5m Fuel Tank, designed for the new rocket, which will be called Esperance. You will also get a 2.5m to 3.75m Interstage Adapter, so you can place this on top of a SLS core stage. Should be looking pretty cool! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oh, and we have just passed 600 downloads! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Congrats on 600 downloads and counting, Kartoffelkuchen ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I think it is a good time to announce a preview of my texture pack for the SELV mod! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![eUoybKG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eUoybKG.jpg)

Cheers ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

*Fr3aKyHDx's texture pack is now online!* 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/K1hTG)

[**Download**](http://www./download/y0lknp7n50a9vtd/Aura-Texture+Pack+1.0.zip)

I am working on a 1.875m Service Module, "HESM" (High Efficiency Service Module), which can be used in really many constructions, like Resupply Modules or upper stages for rockets. It has a really high Isp (392 Vac.) and 100kN thrust and a liquid fuel amount of 540. + it has RCS tanks and built in RCS thrusters. Here's a small album which shows some possible uses of the stage: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/JPHiz)

I am planning to make a full station resupply module, HESM is the first part of it. Hope you like it so far (though don't mind that strange UV map which makes some interesting effects on the tank, I forgot to uncheck something in Unity :S). ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![ET2ubYB.png](http://i.imgur.com/ET2ubYB.png)
[DOWNLOAD FROM KERBALSTUFF](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/830/Stockalike%20Expendable%20Launch%20Vehicles)
Congrats on release!
Im throwing this into my gamedata file now to check but does anyone know if this is ok in 1.04?

It worked in 1.0.3, so it will also work with 1.0.4. The only difference between the two versions is that a bug with the heatshild when loading older savegames was fixed. Though I didn't test it, I'll stay with 1.0.3.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Presenting: The Falcon 9 (Will have to thing of a real project name later):

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Gk8CI)

Including everything you need for making a real Falcon 9! It has a diameter of 3.125m, the Engines are 0.9375m in diameter (Merlin 1D) and 2.5m (Merlin 1D Vacuum). Gridfins will be added to, landing legs are included (+ deploy animation of course)...yeah. I have to do texturing now, and then configuring it for KSP. I hope to release it before tomorrows SpaceX CRS-7 launch and landing attempt. I am optimistic to get it out before. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Is there a 2.5 to 1.875 adapter that would be really useful?
Yes, right now there's one adapter like this in the pack, but there will be more. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Yes, right now there's one adapter like this in the pack, but there will be more. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Can you move it up in the tech tree. Because I have half my tech tree unlocked and I still don't have it unlocked.

Also your version of an lr-87 would be great!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T16:36:37Z" title="06/27/2015 04:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by sp1989**

Ok, ingame now. Now configuring, I am sure I will get it out before CRS-7 tomorrow. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![ms3y7zg.png](http://i.imgur.com/ms3y7zg.png)

this looks GREAT!!!!

- - - Updated - - -

when ever i try to config my mods. they turn out to be like microscopic in game:confused:![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):P
2.5 all the way!
Any chance that the "SpaceK" logo will not be included in the release?

Ok then it will be 2.5m. 

@Sideswiper22: Yes, I can make an alternate texture without SpaceK on it if you want. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![egECSmJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/egECSmJ.png)

Sorry, Falcon 9 is not yet integrated into Career Mode, I will do this later, I wanted to release this now, I will be on holiday for the next week. Gridfins are not yet included, I will have to find a way of how I can actually make them useful in KSP.

I hope you'll like it! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And @Sideswiper22: You'll get your version without the SpaceK! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
i was at the launch
Can't believe it crashed. I was hoping for the first stage to successfully land on the barge. And it's also Elon's birthday.

Yes, it's so sad! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I would have released it earlier, but due to this it took me longer. I was really shocked!

Now, show Elon how to land guys!
Is the falcon merlin cluster one piece or are the engines separate? If it's one piece, are we able to turn off the engines except the middle one if we attempt a landing?

They are all seperate. Wouldn't be good to use the engines in any other vehicle than the F9 otherwise. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) I also have a nosecone, if you want to make a Falcon Heavy. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Yo, are the exhaust pipes supposed to clip though the bottom of the engine mount?
